DOC.brief_summary: Airway dendritic cells control pulmonary immune responses to inhaled particles. It is the aim of the present study to investigate the acute effects of smoking on the number and surface molecule expression of human airway dendritic cells.
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effects of Smoking on Airway Dendritic Cells
DOC.criteria: Active smoking (at least 10 cigarettes per day) Age > 18 years Any chronic diseases Any regular medication Any signs or symptoms of an acute infection
